attributes.action: Regulate All Estate Agents to stop them from inflating house prices artificialy beyond what they are realy worth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To help new buyers get a foot on the housing ladder,but at present excludes anyone earning less that £25000 per year.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
